body_html:
@tatatodd my logs are identical to #5688 and it shouldn't run out of memory(unless it's a bug), I tried running it on many configurations, it fails even on a small network with batch size 1, if it helps, theano is able to run the same configurations without a problem.

The same error occurs both when I run it on TF or Keras with TF backend.

It should be easily reproducible by running a simple graph with tf.nn.atrous.conv2d with a rate higher than ~280.
